query:
UPDATE services 
SET totalSales = CASE 
  WHEN id = 1 THEN 186
  WHEN id = 2 THEN 150
  WHEN id = 3 THEN 120
  WHEN id = 4 THEN 100
  WHEN id = 5 THEN 95
  WHEN id = 6 THEN 90
  WHEN id = 7 THEN 85
  WHEN id = 8 THEN 80
  WHEN id = 9 THEN 75
  WHEN id = 10 THEN 70
  WHEN id = 11 THEN 65
  WHEN id = 12 THEN 60
  WHEN id = 13 THEN 55
  WHEN id = 14 THEN 50
  WHEN id = 15 THEN 45
  WHEN id = 16 THEN 40
  WHEN id = 17 THEN 35
  WHEN id = 18 THEN 30
  WHEN id = 19 THEN 25
  WHEN id = 20 THEN 20
  ELSE totalSales
END
WHERE id BETWEEN 1 AND 20
